string.text: I, professor Kruglov, in the name of science and humanity delete the reports of our researches. Unsafe knowledge mustn't get to the hands of malevolent \nelements, who will use them in their criminal aims. Those who read this note should know, that our group has been hit over the "wild territory" by Freedom \nanarchists, under command of famous cutthroat Wolfhound. And to the moment you are reading this note, we are most likely to be dead.

... as it turned out to be, the radiation above all influences the higher spheres of thinking. The experienced showed that only human and animals with highly 
organized reasoning, such as dogs, horses, sensible to this emanation. Out of the elements abovementioned, only human is most subjected to deep into the 
trance, the laboratory animals only suffered the great effect withing the bounds of fear. Basing upon these suppositions, we can make a conclusion about the 
specialization of influencing exclusively human brain. The continual experiments on the "volunteers" proved that the trance effect can be palliated with 
medicinally treatment. Also we've developed the experimental devices that protect the human brain from dosed emanation influence. According to our 
calculations the source of radiation is situated in the center of Yantar lake, most probably the nature of the source is artificial and it's highly possible to 
deactivate them. Also, there is a danger, that unreliable elements can gain access to the source of emanation and take it under it's control.
Radar is turned off at 8:30 and turned on again at 9:00
Barkeep: Duty steems highly its reputation and wants them to be taken out silently. \n You're enough to eliminate their boss named "Lucky" and bring his PDA as a proof.

Barkeep: So you have to get second key from Hog. Then you should get into the laboratory and \nobtain papers. Don't forget to buy suit protecting against radiation, you won't be able to force through \nthe Dark Valley without it, there is extremely high level of radiation.
In order to join "Duty" you have to receive the approval of one of the most competent fighters of the faction. And prove the "Duty's" leader that you are worthy \nof being one of them.

Barman: "You task is to eliminate Tyran, leader of Mercenaries grouping. The Mercenaries detachment has broken through to the wild territory and settled at \nthe building site. Be careful, the part of the combatants camped at the approaches to the site. When you bring me Tyran's PDA, you'll receive the reward."

General Voronin: "The war with Freedom comes to an end, Branded One. You have made a good contribution to the common cause, and now I wish to dot \nthe i's in this war. I want you to eliminate the leader of Freedom."

Captain Ivantsov: "...prior to making any conclusions, you must take a brief check-up. You have to find the archival file from the abandoned building accross \nthe way. The task is of the simple ones, just enter the building, grab the file and fetch it to me. What can ever be easier, right? When I have the file, than we'll \ndecide whether you suit Duty or not."
Hunter: Bring me my rifle back. I've lost it near Bloodsucker's dwelling, I give you coorditates. And be \ncarefull, they are very malicious.

Wolfhound: "We've got a little hunt here. We've pressed the scientists, there behind the copter. By fellas are firing at them from time to time, in order not to let \nthem escape. So you join us, we'll be finishing them. If you help us, I'll give you the scientific suit, taken from the brought down helicopter. You target - \nprofessor Kruglov, kill him, otherwise he escapes during the battle, I know his kind. If you kill him - suit is yours, if not - your problems."
Barkeep: "All we need is to reach antennas when emanation is lowered, and cut them off.

-breack through the ambush to scientists
Kruglov: "Stalker, help! We were attacked by mercenaries, good few of our guys died. Help us, we 
won't stay in debt"

"... be careful there, there are 15 men or else, we don't know exactly"
Barkeep: "Go to the scientists, find out where X16 is and get the \nmissing part of the documents"

I've Looked through documents which found soldieries in former SRI. The conclusion is: this institute, 
last years, before the meltdown was the protection of non governmental laboratory ?-18, which to all 
appearances conducted a certain mysterious experiment. Where a laboratory is – the documents 
has no answer. It looks like militaries don't know about it either. Yeah. There appear more riddles. 
But it can be a filament which merchants may require. Well, now a there's a way coming farther on 
a north, to the merchant on the name Barman.

Yeah, it's a gloomy place this laboratory ?18... and its present dwellers...never even could think that 
such scums can exist in the world. I have found some documents. I understood a little from them 
that there are certain technical specifications on some blocks to the emitters of Kaymanov. The fact 
is these blocks targeted at other laboratory which code is ?16 and to all appearances also is secret 
one.

Hemm, Merchants have really found out a lot of information as for these laboratories. It was a real 
surprise for Barmen the information about emitters and about ?16. And he is sure now, that this 
«brain scorcher» is handmade. He thinks that this laboratory ?16 is not far from the camp of 
scientists near a lake Jantar. They are studying at this moment a radiation which has similar effect 
like «scorcher». So now my way lies to scientific fraternity of the Zone.

I've Met Barman. Having documents from Agroprom looked through, he assumed that this ?-18 
was in the so-called Dark Valley and offered to me to drop in there for the purpose of 
information and documents retrieval. He says he has sent Duty spies already with a task to get to 
this cave. But they disappeared. A barman assumed that they became prisoners of the gangsters 
which have their base not far. And if it so, all that Duty spies found is the possession of the leader 
of gangsters - Hog. Barman, calls to the carefulness and obviously something holds back about 
this cave. Well, all right, for a work: at first I have to talk to Hog, and if a «talk» will be 
successful, then I go to the underground.

Well, I am ready to go to "scorcher" I've found out from Madman about lowering of power of radiation 
and about a safe place, where I will be able to wait till this time. In other time my Psy-defence would 
not be able to help me. I have to find enntrance into the underground bunker of laboratory ?19 and the 
way to the control room of the "brain scorcher's" antennas.

12.01.2012 
 Damn that management. They can't give rest to the old man. "Black mess" firstly, then the odd city 
in Russia. Now again: go, dear Gordon, to the boudless 
steppes of Ukraine. Here is your crow-bar and wish you good pastime.
 
 20.03.2012 
 Made it in the Zone. I can hardly believe that there are no bears here? And whom else will I have to 
fight with here? Well, I'm getting used very hard. In 
America all recognize me by a single glance and treat me with burgers for free. And here I had to sell 
my crow-bar for the canned meat.
 
 26.04.2012 
 The blow-out began. Barman told me to hide my american butt as soon as possible and not to show 
up. I've driven out several rats from the abandoned 
tunnel. I hope I could wait this damn foul weather through.
